title: President Donald J. Trump is Tearing Down Red Tape in Order to Build More Affordable Housing – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
June 25, 2019
We’re lifting up forgotten communities, creating exciting new opportunities, and helping every American find their path to the American Dream.
						President Donald J. Trump					BREAKING GROUND ON AFFORDABLE HOUSING: President Donald J. Trump is working to eliminate barriers that are holding back affordable housing development. CUTTING EXCESSIVE COSTS TO SPUR CONSTRUCTION: Regulations are creating excessive costs that are holding back the development of needed affordable housing. HELPING AMERICANS FIND A HOME: President Trump is building on efforts his Administration has taken to lift up all Americans and make it easier for them to find a home.
